titles.title: Governors Island Preservation Act of 1999
To provide for the continued maintenance and preservation of Governors Island, New York, by the Administrator of General Services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.

bill.summary: 3/25/1999--Introduced. Governors Island Preservation Act of 1999 - Amends the Balanced Budget Act of 1997 to repeal the mandate for the sale of Governors Island, New York, by the Administrator of General Services.Authorizes appropriations for continued maintenance and preservation of Governors Island, including buildings and other improvements on the island.
